```{r setup}
library(trendyr)
library(readr)
library(dbplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)

```

```{r}

head(stockpriceData)


```
 
```{r}

stockpriceData_trendr <- trendr(df = stockpriceData,
              weekend_effects = FALSE,
              value.colname = "price",
              time.colname = "date",
              #output.save = TRUE,
              #output.file = "stockpriceData_trendr.csv",
              output.plot = TRUE)

```

```{r}
flightpath(stockpriceData_trendr)

```
